channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Gallipoli at 110
item.description: Instead of diverting German resources to the south and shortening the war, it exhausted the Allies and extended it.

item.title: Minneapolis Shooting Reveals Democrat Party’s Comfort With Satanic Talking Points
item.description: Anyone mocking God or prayer after a tragedy is working for the devil.

item.title: White House to slash $4.9 billion in foreign aid identified as 'wasteful'

item.title: Appeals court finds Trump's sweeping tariffs unconstitutional but leaves them in place for now

item.title: Appeals court strikes down Trump's tariff power in major decision
item.description: A federal appeals court ruled many of President Trump's tariffs are illegal, dealing a potentially crippling blow to his trade agenda.

item.title: Why I Said the Federal Reserve Is Unconstitutional
item.description: ‘But it works well’ is not a sufficient legal argument.

item.title: Democratic lawmakers rebuked for scorning prayer after Minneapolis Catholic school shooting
item.description: Democrats reacting to the deadly Minneapolis school shooting by belittling prayer may want to ask the Almighty for help with their messaging.

item.title: In Defense of Prayer
item.description: Democrats’ dismissive attitude toward prayer is rooted in arrogance.

item.title: Trump Can Fire Lisa Cook
item.description: Subjecting the Fed to presidential control would restore political accountability for public policy choices to the elected branches of government.
